duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support in both file creation and preservation
Utilize specialized knowledge of the processes, procedures, and practices in support of civil matters typically handled by a USAO
Prepare initial draft of pleadings for review by Assistant United States Attorneys (AUSA)
Read and analyze written discovery and summarize for AUSAs
Review and evaluate document production and summarize for AUSAs
Support search for and identification of expert witnesses
Evaluate expert discovery and reports and prepare initial impressions for AUSAs
Prepare final pleadings and exhibits to be filed with the district court
Conducts preliminary legal research in support of defensive and offensive civil claims
Track and maintain court-ordered and discovery deadlines
